function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sharing of highly sensitive health data","Impact":"Risk of data breaches, privacy violations, and misuse of personal health information","Mitigation":"Implement strict data security measures, ethical guidelines, and data access controls","Technologies":"Secure data encryption, anonymization techniques, access management systems","People":"Participants in research studies, patients with electronic health records","Owner":"Research institutions, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of interoperability of heterogeneous health-related data","Impact":"Difficulty in combining and analyzing data from different sources, hindering effective research and response to public health threats","Mitigation":"Adoption of common standards for data encoding and sharing, implementation of data integration and harmonization tools","Technologies":"Data standardization protocols, integration platforms, interoperability frameworks","People":"Health researchers, data analysts, public health agencies","Owner":"Health research institutions, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Constraints of sharing and utilizing sensitive health data","Impact":"Limitation in leveraging the full potential of shared data for enhancing knowledge about public health threats, slower response to health emergencies","Mitigation":"Ethical data sharing frameworks, secure data access protocols, governance and oversight mechanisms","Technologies":"Ethical data sharing platforms, secure access management tools, governance and compliance software","People":"Health researchers, public health professionals, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, regulatory bodies"}]}
